item.description:
@xgreenxdogx wrote:

I don’t know what to do so will some of you elite coders help me ;D

This is what im useing in class 8.

if(i == 8002){
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;
class8.aString170 = “Dragon claws”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A set of fighting claws.”.getBytes(); //examine info
class8.anInt174 = 13699;
class8.anInt181 = 630;
class8.anInt190 = 268;
class8.anInt198 = 1340;
class8.anInt204 = 0;
class8.anInt169 = -7;
class8.anInt194 = -13;
class8.anInt165 = 13698;
class8.anInt200 = 13698;
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
}

Im pretty sure its right, and i know all he models are there but i need a tu on how to fix this problem so here what im dealing with:

Please help
